About Blind Pass Resort

New Ownership as of December 1st 2016. Blind Pass Resort is a 25 room boutique hotel property, located a short walk away from the water of St Pete Beach, recently rated the 2nd best beach in the US by TripAdvisor! In addition, our property was featured on the Today Show as the best "Bargain Stay Hotel in St Pete Beach" (See video at 1:19). Besides a great location, our property offers FREE WiFi, FREE Parking and NO RESORT FEES. Relax by the pool or around the fountains in the courtyard, and when you are ready to explore the town, take advantage of the free beach shuttle which will bring you all around the island.

We look forward to having you as our guest at Blind Pass Resort!

Photos

Room Options

  • One Bedroom
  • Studio
  • Double Queen Efficiency
  • King Efficiency
  • Suite

Our one bedroom units are larger than your average hotel room and offer guest a full kitchenette along with a pullout couch in a separate living room. All one bedrooms units come equipped with free wifi and cable television.

Property Amenities

  • Courtyard with fountain and light classical music
  • Temperature controlled resort style pool with fountain, lounge chairs and tables
  • Onsite BBQ facilities
  • Onsite washer and dryer for guest use
  • Free common area internet
  • Free in-room wifi
  • Free parking
  • Ironing board & iron, coffee makers, fridge and microwaves are available in rooms.
  • Free shuttle around the island and beaches
  • Discount cards at local restaurants

Our studio units are a comparable size to your average hotel room and do not have a kitchenette but do have a microwave and fridge. All studios come equipped with free wifi and cable television.

Property Amenities

  • Courtyard with fountain and light classical music
  • Temperature controlled resort style pool with fountain, lounge chairs and tables
  • Onsite BBQ facilities
  • Onsite washer and dryer for guest use
  • Free common area internet
  • Free in-room wifi
  • Free parking
  • Ironing board & iron, coffee makers, fridge and microwaves are available in rooms.
  • Free shuttle around the island and beaches
  • Discount cards at local restaurants

Our Double Queen Efficiency units come equipped with a full kitchenette and two queen size mattresses, perfect for families and friends. All double queen efficiency units come equipped with free wifi and cable television.

Our King Efficiency units come with a full kitchenette and a king size mattress, great for couples! All king efficiency units come equipped with free wifi and cable television.

Our suites range from one bedroom condo-style units with a separate living room and bedroom, two full bathrooms and a kitchen, to our two bedroom two bathroom condo-style layout. These suites are far from your average hotel room and are great for those who want some extra space and comfort during their stay. All suites come equipped with free wifi and cable television.
